title: Drawing, "Sketches from South America", 1853, probably May
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at top, in various locations:  Snow peak in the clouds /  Rock / 2; at left: 2 Naples yellow ; and at center:  [an arrow and] South ; at bottom center: abras / 2 ; with figures, at various locations; and at bottom right: 2 Pinkish white / with orange ochre streaks / 3 greyish / 4 sandy / 5 brownish / 6 clayish color.
description: Horizontal view of water bordered laterally by wooded rocky slopes, and by hills and mountains in the background, at top; and a possible fissured rock and detailed sketch of a bank inscired with figures, at bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches from South America", 1853, probably May.
1853, probably May. Graphite on light gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-105.
